cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Foreign Affairs on April 5, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 7372, Protecting Semiconductor Supply Chain Materials from Authoritarians Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 58 (Friday, April 1, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. TITUS:
H.R. 7372.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
The Congress enacts this bill pursuant to Article I of the
United States Constitution.
[Page H4127]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

title: Protecting Semiconductor Supply Chain Materials from Authoritarians Act
